alert.note: Alert for Ashland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 3:32PM CST until November 18 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible for northeastern Ashland county. Elsewhere, including the cities of Ashland and Mellen, expect additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Ashland County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
